GSP33brssbh1u:2103: para evātmā dehendriyamanobuddhyupādhibhiḥ paricchidyamāno bālaiḥ śārīra ityupacaryate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2105: tadapekṣayā ca karmakartṛtvādibhedavyavahāro na virudhyate prāk 'tattvamasi' ityātmaikatvopadeśaghaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2110: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca / BBs_1,2.7 /
GSP33brssbh1u:2118: sarvagatasya tu sarvadeśeṣu vidyamānatvātparicchinnadeśavyapadeśo 'pi kayācidapekṣayā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2119: yathā samastavasudhādhipatirapi hi sannayodhyādhipatiriti vyapadiśyate kayā punarapekṣayā sarvagataḥ sannīśvaror'bhakaukā aṇīyāṃśca vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2121: evamaṇīyastvādiguṇagaṇopeta īśvarastatra hṛdayapuṇḍarīke nicāyyo draṣṭavya upadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2128: tadevaṃ nicāyyatvāpekṣaṃ brahmaṇor'bhakaukastvamaṇīyastvaṃ ca na pāramārthikam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2130: hṛdayāyatanatvādbrahmaṇo hṛdayāyatanānāṃ ca pratiśarīraṃ bhinnatvādbhinnāyatanānāṃ ca śukādīnāmanekatvasāvayavatvānityatvādidoṣadarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi tatprasaṅga iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:2137: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt / BBs_1,2.8 /
GSP33brssbh1u:2155: yadapyekatvādbrahmaṇa ātmāntarābhāvāccharīrasya bhogena brahṇo bhogaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2159: yathāśāstraṃ tarhi śāstrīyor'thaḥ pratipattavyo na tatrārdhajaratīyaṃ labhyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2160: śāstraṃ ca tattvamasi ityapahatapāpmatvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ brahma śārīrasyātmatvenopadiśacchārīrasyaiva tāvadupabhoktṛtvaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2162: athāgṛhītaṃ śārīrasya brahmaṇaikatvaṃ tadā mithyājñānanimittaḥ śārīrasyopabhogaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2164: nahi bālaistalamalinatādibhirvyomni vikalpyamāne talamalitādiviśiṣṭameva paramārthato vyoma bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2180: ardhaṃmukhamātraṃ jaratyā buddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅāgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīnyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2181: manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyaiveśvarasya dhyānārthaṃ hārdatve 'pi nirdeṣatvāttasminneva śāṇḍilyavidyāvidye sarvaṃ ityādivākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2186: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate- 'yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2187: mṛtyūryasyopasevanaṃ ka ityā veda yatra saḥ' (1.2.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2202: iti darśanādityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- attātra paramātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2205: tādṛśasya cādyasya na paramātmano 'nyaḥ kārtsyenāttā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2219: FN: yasya paramātmano brahma kṣatraṃ cobhe jātī prasiddhānnavadodanau bhavataḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2222: taṃ nirviśeṣamātmānaṃ 'nāvirato duścaritāt' iti mantroktopāyavānyathā veda itthā itthamanyastadrahito na vedetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2233: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durvijñānatvaṃ paramātmaliṅgam // 10 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2236: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33brssbh1u:2237: kaṭhavallīṣveva paṭhyate- 'ṛtaṃ pibantau loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssbh1u:2238: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañṭagnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2247: atha jīvaparamātmānau tato jīvādvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2255: iti ca dvivacanena dvayoḥ pānaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2278: naca sati saṃbhavesarvagatasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭadeśatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:2280: paramātmā tu na sukṛtasya vā duṣkṛtasya vā gocare vartate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2281: 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2285: kasmāt, ātmānau hi tāvubhāvapi cetanau samānasvabhāvau /
GSP33brssbh1u:2289: tadiha ṛtapānena liṅgena niścite vijñānātmani dvitīyānveṣaṇāyāṃ samānasvabhāvaścetanaḥ paramātmaiva pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2292: guhāhitatvaṃ tu śrutismṛtiṣvasakṛtparamātmana eva dṛśyate- 'guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam' (kāṭha. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssbh1u:2295: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyartho deśaviśeṣopadeśo na virudhyata ityedapyuktameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:2305_0: bhuñjānau sukṛtasya loke samyagarjitasyādṛṣṭasya kārye dehe vartamāno parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:2305_1: sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasminparame śreṣṭhe yā guhā nabhokṣaṇā tāṃ praviśya
GSP33brssbh1u:2308: manuṣye prete mṛtesati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2315: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2317: guhāhitaṃ buddhau sthitaṃ gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2319: parame vyoman śreṣṭhe hārdākāśe tatra guhāyāṃ buddau /
GSP33brssbh1u:2325: ityādinā pareṇa granthena rathirathādirūpakakalpanayā vijñānātnāṃ rathinaṃ saṃsāramokṣayorgantāraṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2329: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti' (kā. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssbh1u:2332: brahmavido vadanti iti ca vaktṛviśeṣopādanaṃ paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2334: eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 'dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:2339: anantare ca mantre tāveva draṣṭṛdraṣṭavyabhāvena viśinaṣṭi- 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno 'nīśayā śocati muhyamānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2340: juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya mahimānamiti vītaśokaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2341: apara āha- 'dvā suparṇā' iti neyamṛgasyādhikaraṇasya siddhāntaṃ bhajate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2343: 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvamanaś nannanyo 'bhicākaśītītyanaś nannanyo 'bhipaśyati jñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2347: tatraiva ca vyākhyātatvāt- 'tadetatsattvaṃ yena svapnaṃ paśyati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2348: atha yo 'yaṃ śārīra upadraṣṭā sa kṣetrajñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2350: nahyatra śārīraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādinā saṃsāradharmeṇopeto vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2356: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raca ādhvaṃsate ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2357: kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvam ityacetane sattve bhoktṛtvāvacanamti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2358: ucyate- neyaṃ śrutiracetanasya sattvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravṛttā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2359: kiṃ tarhi cetanasya kṣetrajñasyābhoktṛtvaṃ brahmasbhāvatāṃ ca vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2361: idaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ta sattvakṣetrajñayoritaretisvabhāvāvivekakṛtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2366: tathāca śrutiḥ- 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' ityādinā svapnadṛṣṭahastyādivyavahāravadavidyāviṣaya eva kartṛtvādivyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2373: tata eva gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ gahanatāṃ gatamīśvaram adhyātmaprayogaḥ pratyagātmanyeva cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2376: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ pasyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2382: anyadivābhāsabhūtaṃ nānātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāttatra avidyakabuddhyādisaṃbandhādanyo bhūtvānyacakṣuṣā paśyet /
GSP33brssbh1u:2388: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2389: etadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' (chā. 4.15.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:2391: tatra saṃśayaḥ kimayaṃ pratibimbātmakṣyadhikaraṇo nirdiśyate 'thavā vijñānātmā uta devatātmendriyasyādhiṣṭhātāthaveśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2395: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti ca prasiddavadupadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2397: sa hi cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyaṃścakṣuṣi saṃnihito bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2413: 'tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2415: 'etaṃ saṃyaddhāma ityācakṣate etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2416: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2417: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:2432: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2433: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2434: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2435: kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate- 'tasyoditi nāma' 'hiraṇyaśmaśruḥ' (chā. 1.6.7,6) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2436: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:2437: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2440: FN: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2446: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2450: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2451: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2452: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssbh1u:2455: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:2456: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2457: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2460: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2461: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne kaṃśabdasya viśeṣaṇatvenaivopayuktatvātasukhasya guṇasyādhyeyatvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2462: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2465: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2466: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2467: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:2468: iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2469_1: tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca'
GSP33brssbh1u:2475: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2479_0: yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā
GSP33brssbh1u:2481: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2483_0: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti' ityupakramya
GSP33brssbh1u:2483_1: 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva
GSP33brssbh1u:2483_2: devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2484: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate // 16 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssbh1u:2488: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2499: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2501: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2502: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:2505: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2506: tathā vijñānātmano 'pi sādhāraṇe kṛtsnaśarīrendriyasaṃbandhe sati cakṣuṣyevāvasthitatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2512: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2522: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssbh1u:2529: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2533_0: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati' ityupakramya
GSP33brssbh1u:2533_1: śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī
GSP33brssbh1u:2533_2: śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2535: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2541: tathāca śrūyate- 'pṛthivyeva yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2543: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2545: akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo 'ntaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu śrūyate sa paramātmaiva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2547: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:2548: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2550: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssbh1u:2551: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2577: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /

GSP33brssbh1u:5530: pratijñā tāvat- 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5531: tatra caikena vijñātena sarvamandavijñātamapi vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:5535: dṛṣṭānto 'pi yathā 'somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityupādānakāraṇagocara evamāmnāyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:5536: tathā 'ekena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' 'ekena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' (chā. 6.1.4,5,6) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5537: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2)
GSP33brssbh1u:5541: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssbh1u:5542: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7)
GSP33brssbh1u:5544: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssbh1u:5545: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (pā.sū. 1.4.30)
GSP33brssbh1u:5548: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo 'sti,
GSP33brssbh1u:5562: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5565: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5574: yatkāraṇaṃ sākṣādbrahmaiva kāraṇamupādāyobhau prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:5576: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:5589: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5591: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5596: yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva vikārātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmnāyate 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
GSP33brssbh1u:5606: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim' (muṇḍa. 3.1.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:5608: yoniśabdaśca prakṛtivacanaḥ samadhigato loke 'pṛthivī yoniroṣadhivanaspatīnām' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5610: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.104.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5611: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssbh1u:5614: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi,
GSP33brssbh1u:5626: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5631: ityārabhya pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ sūtraireva punaḥ punarāśaṅkya nirākṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:5632: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5638: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5642: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 4 //
